question: when did the first immigrants come to hawaii
vanilla_rag_result: The first immigrants to Hawaii are believed to have arrived no later than 800 AD, with evidence of settlement continuing until about 1300 AD. These early settlers came from the Marquesas, Tonga, Samoa, Easter Island, and greater Polynesia. Additionally, Chinese workers began settling in Hawaii starting in 1789, and the first Japanese immigrants arrived on June 19, 1868.
